com.omerozer.knit

Class KnitModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.omerozer.knit.KnitModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryEntity, ModelInterface

    public abstract class KnitModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelInterface
    Model classes that are exposed to the developer by Knit. These need to be annotated with Model to be registered with Knit. All KnitModels will have a InternalModel counterpart that is actually used by Knit framework to manage these.

      • requestImmediately

        protected <T> KnitResponse<T> requestImmediately(java.lang.String data,
                                                 java.lang.Object... params)
        This method is used when requesting data from other models. Common use case for Umbrella models that rely on other models. Does not provide any Async support. It shouldn't matter however, the request method that is making the call will have it's SchedulerInterfaces set.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the response body of an KnitResponse.
        Parameters:
        data - the tag of the data that is requested.
        params - Extra params being passed to the model.
        Returns:
        KnitResponse generated by the model.

      • shouldLoad

        public boolean shouldLoad()
        Description copied from interface: MemoryEntity
        Returns whether this entity recently released it's resources via this#onMemoryLow() or not. If this#onMemoryLow() is called, this will return true. Otherwise will always return false.
        Specified by:
        shouldLoad in interface MemoryEntity
        Returns:
        Whether this entity recently released it's resources via this#onMemoryLow() or not.
        See Also:
        MemoryEntity
